edu.snu.rixk

Class GameViewManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.snu.rixk.GameViewManager

  • public class GameViewManager
extends java.lang.Object
    GameViewManager This class keeps track of the currently active View and handles the starting of Views.
    Version:
    $Revision$ ($Author$)
    Author:
    Tim Solum

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addViewToMap(java.lang.String key, RixkView view)
      Adds a mapping of a key to a RixkView.
      void endGame()
      This triggers a flag where the game will end as soon as the active View releases control.
      static GameViewManager getInstance()
      Get the instance of the GameViewManager for the game of Rixk.

      Returns a RixkView from the view map.

      Starts the game with firstView as the first active View.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static GameViewManager getInstance()
        Get the instance of the GameViewManager for the game of Rixk.
        Returns:
        The game's instance of the GameViewManager

      • addViewToMap

        public void addViewToMap(java.lang.String key,
                         RixkView view)
        Adds a mapping of a key to a RixkView. Use the static view constants defined in the GameViewManager class.
        Parameters:
        key - The key mapped to a View
        view - The View the key maps to

      • getViewFromMap

        public RixkView getViewFromMap(java.lang.String key)
        Returns a RixkView from the view map. Use the static view constants defined in the GameViewManager class to access these views.
        Parameters:
        key - The key mapped to a RixkView
        Returns:
        The RixkView

      • setNextActiveView

        public void setNextActiveView(RixkView nextView)
        This method queues up the View that will be next once the active View releases control.
        Parameters:
        nextView - The next active View

      • startGame

        public void startGame(RixkView firstView)
        Starts the game with firstView as the first active View.
        Parameters:
        firstView - The first active View

      • endGame

        public void endGame()
        This triggers a flag where the game will end as soon as the active View releases control.
